/product/:productId: GET : get product by product id
/product/new: POST : create a new product (in request body keys required for creation of new product are 'name' and 'price')
/product/:productId: PUT : update product (in request body keys required for creation of new product are 'name' and/or 'price')
/review/new/:productId: POST : create a new review for a Product (in request body key required for creation of new review is 'description')
/review/:productId: GET : get all reviews of a product by product id (VIRTUAL POPULATING the REVIEWS)
